definition: a short light metallic sound, to make cracks or chinks in
details:
noun
- a short light metallic sound
= synonyms: click
- a narrow opening as e.g. between planks in a wall
- (ethnic slur) offensive term for a person of Chinese descent
verb
- to make cracks or chinks in
= synonyms: check
- to fill the chinks of, as with caulking
- to make or emit a high sound
= synonyms: tinkle, tink
